name: The Intern - O Estágio
description:
The intern is a Episodic Adventure Action Platform with Anime/Manga influences, beautyfull animations and a deep history. Be part of that adventure, join us! We need you to build a universe.

The Intern tells a history about a young creative looking for a Interneship. But after receive a misterious mail your perception of reality will never be the same again.

"Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need."
-Goku, Dragon Ball


EARLY ACCESS - PRE-ORDER
The game is currently in development, meaning there are many more features comming soon. Purchasing the alpha will ensure you get all future versions of the game(Episodes and any other stuff related) , with a new build coming out every month and a new episode every two. Like a TV Show/Series but better!


EVERY COMMENT COUNT
Suggestions, critiques and ideas from the community in all fields of research and sign up for the game in the new episodes. As social media also serve to decide points of history, character, enemies and even mechanical within the game. Stay in touch. Make creative stuffs. I want to make the game for you and with you.

FEATURES
-Your power get bigger when you're in trouble.
-Episodic history.
-8 Levels + Alpha
-3 Bosses + 2 secrets
-POWERFULL Summons and Dragons!
-Your atributtes fits you play style.
-Charge the power and get stronger.
-Community comments and sugestions in any media counts.
-Secrets, Masks, Power and more!
- Procedural Skill Tree!
-Transformations!
